scripts.test: npm run test:mocha && npm run test:visual && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:visual: npm run drop-db && npm run seed-db && cd test/visual && rm -rf backstop_data/bitmaps_test && backstop test
scripts.test:e2e:chrome: npm run drop-db && rm -rf test/e2e/html-report/ && npm run webdriver:update && protractor test/e2e/protractorChrome.conf.js
scripts.test:e2e:firefox: npm run drop-db && rm -rf test/e2e/html-report/ && npm run webdriver:update && protractor test/e2e/protractorFirefox.conf.js
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:chrome && npm run test:e2e:firefox
